arts.ttl: Inter Milan Vs Fiorentina – Under-Pressure Viola Coach Has Starting XI Clear
arts.sum: Fiorentina manager Stefano Pioli is on the precipice of an early dismissal as his out-of-sorts side takes on Inter Milan tomorrow night. According to Gazzetta dello Sport via FCInterNews, the 60-year-old has already chosen his starting lineup for this high-stakes clash. It’s been a disastrous start to the season for Fiorentina. arts.ttl: Inter Milan Vs Fiorentina – Croatia Starlet Frontrunner To Replace Injured Armenian Veteran
arts.sum: Petar Sucic is reportedly the frontrunner to replace Henrikh Mkhitaryan in Wednesday’s Serie A clash between Inter Milan and Fiorentina. According to Gazzetta dello Sport via FCInterNews, the 21-year-old has overtaken Piotr Zielinski in the pecking order. Inter will take on Fiorentina without Henrikh Mkhitaryan, who picked up a thigh injury against Napoli last weekend.
